description: This file implements an in-memory user repository class for development purposes in a C# project related to event planning. It provides methods to add users and retrieve them by email or ID, with a simple seeded demo user for testing.

classes.name: InMemoryUserRepository
classes.description: A simple in-memory implementation of IUserRepository for development and demonstration purposes.

methods.name: InMemoryUserRepository
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the repository with a demo user.

methods.name: Add
methods.description: Adds a User to the in-memory list and returns it.

methods.name: GetByEmail
methods.description: Retrieves a user by email address, case-insensitive.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a user by their unique identifier (GUID).
